artist: Artist: Edgar Chahine; Editor: Edmond Sagot
creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
description: Full-length portrait of actress Louise France playing the role of Madame Vauquer in Honoré de Balzac "Le Père Goriot."
inscription: LR on verso, in pencil: Louise France (Role de Mme Vauquer)
markings: LR in pencil below image: 17/30 | Blindstamp, LL below image: Ed SAGOT / Editeur / Paris
signed: LL below image in pencil: Edgar Chahine
title: Louise France (Madame Vauquer)
